title: Anatomy-Guided Radiology Report Generation with Pathology-Aware Regional Prompts
details: Y Gao, D Marshall, X Xing, J Ning, G Papanastasiou… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Radiology reporting generative AI holds significant potential to alleviate clinical workloads and streamline medical care. However, achieving high clinical accuracy is challenging, as radiological images often feature subtle lesions and intricate …
